thread.title: BRIEF-Lightinthebox Opens Blockchain Technology Research Lab

title: BRIEF-Lightinthebox Opens Blockchain Technology Research Lab

organizations.name: brief-lightinthebox opens blockchain technology research lab
brief-lightinthebox opens blockchain technology research lab reuters

text:
29 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Lightinthebox Opens Blockchain Technology Research Lab Reuters Staff 
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Lightinthebox Holding Co Ltd: * LIGHTINTHEBOX OPENS BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY RESEARCH LAB 
* LIGHTINTHEBOX HOLDING - OPENED BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY RESEARCH LAB TO “EXPLORE AND DEVELOP BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY PLATFORMS” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
